description:
Cook delicious wood-fired pizza, bread, roasts and anything else you can think of. The Ooni Karu Pizza Oven cooks with wood and charcoal, giving your food a rich smoky flavour and high, even heat. The oven reaches 500°C (932°F) in just 15 minutes, and once it's up to temperature, you can cook a 12in. pizza in only 1 minute. It takes wood-fired cooking to a whole new level.

  • Removable chimney and collapsible legs for easy transport
  • Max pizza size: 30cm
  • Cooking surface: 33 x 33 cm
  • Insulated oven body and thick baking stones retain heat for efficient, even cooking
  • Materials: 430 stainless steel, stainless steel rivets, glass-reinforced nylon handles, cordierite baking stones
  • In the box: Ooni Karu oven, wood and charcoal fuel tray with burner grate, cordierite stone baking board, oven door and chimney, fuel tray door, manual and safety instructions
  • Compatible with kindling sized wood, charcoal or gas (burner sold separately). Not compatible with wood pellets
name: Ooni Karu 12 Multi-Fuel Pizza Oven
